categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Biabru was a female Human agent of the Imperial Intelligence of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, she was part of Darth Marr's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Republic forces under Satele Shan.
Agent Biabru appears as an Imperial Agent trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
